channel.title: Documentation on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GraphQL Explorer removal from API documentation on November 7, 2025
item.description:
On November 7, 2025 GitHub retired the GraphQL Explorer from its API documentation. The change, following a prior announcement, affects a small number of users who used the Explorer to experiment with the GitHub GraphQL API.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: ai: Whatâ€™s new in Azure AI Foundry | August 2025
item.description:
August 2025 update for Azure AI Foundry: GPT-5 is available, Model Router adds GPT-5 support, Responses API reaches general availability, Browser Automation enters public preview, and there are additions and updates including Sora, Mistral Document AI, FLUX image models, OpenAI gpt-oss with Foundry Local, plus SDK and documentation improvements.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog
